    New Publication on COVID-19 and Active Labor Published in Obstetrics & Gynecology!

    less than 1 minute read

    Working with Dr. Alison Edelman and Dr. Amy Hermesch and driven by the lack of understanding around the potential for the aerosolized spread of SARS-CoV-2 during active labor, our team embarked on a sampling campaign in the rooms of laboring mothers.

    The full paper can be found here in Obstetrics & Gynecology!

    Tags: New Publication, SARS-CoV-2

    Categories: blog

    Updated: October 1, 2020
